name: file_read
description: Read the contents of a text file from the workspace.

path.description: Path to the file, relative to the workspace root.

name: file_write
description: Write text content to a file in the workspace, creating it if necessary.

path.description: Path to the file, relative to the workspace root.

name: apply_diff
description: Apply an ACP-style diff to one or more files in the workspace.

diff.description: ACP-style diff object describing file edits.

name: run_simulation
description: Compile and run a Verilog/SystemVerilog testbench using the configured simulator.

top_module.description: Name of the top-level module under test.

testbench_path.description: Path to the testbench file, relative to the workspace root.

source_files.description: Additional source files (RTL) to include in compilation.

flags.description: Extra flags to pass to the simulator.

name: lint_verilog
description: Run a Verilog/SystemVerilog linter on a file.

path.description: Path to the file to lint, relative to the workspace root.

name: waveform_extract
description: Extract a summary of selected signals from a VCD file.

vcd_path.description: Path to the VCD file, relative to the workspace root.

signals.description: List of signal names to inspect.

max_events.description: Maximum number of events per signal to return.
